title: Reaction Timer
author: MicroGames
essence: Press START, wait for green, then tap as fast as you can. The game measures your reaction time in milliseconds and shows it clearly for quick comparisons.
reactions: Clear mechanic: One simple step and you’re playing — ideal on mobile.
Intrinsic motivation: Milliseconds invite improvement and friendly competition.
Instant rounds: Perfect for quick breaks, no loading or connectivity required.

title: Maze Runner
author: Ploynky
essence: Drag the dot from START to GOAL without touching the walls. Each level grows the maze size; the timer tracks completion time.
reactions: Explodes on wall touch — then try again.
More cells per level means longer routes.

title: Ping Pong
author: CodeWithRandom
essence: Classic Ping Pong game. Move your paddle to hit the ball and score against the computer.

title: Snake Game
author: CodeWithRandom
essence: Eat the food and grow your snake. Don't hit the walls or yourself!

title: Space Invaders
author: CodeWithRandom
essence: Defend the galaxy from waves of alien invaders. Shoot them down before they reach you!

title: Tetris
author: CodeWithRandom
essence: The classic puzzle game. Fit the falling blocks together to clear lines and score points.

title: Classic Pong
author: Classic Arcade Collection
essence: The original arcade tennis game. Control your paddle to hit the ball past the AI opponent.
reactions: The game that started it all.
Mouse or touch controls for smooth gameplay.

title: Classic Breakout
author: Classic Arcade Collection
essence: Break all the bricks with your ball and paddle. Don't let the ball fall!
reactions: Multiple colored brick rows for varied scoring.

title: Classic Frogger
author: Classic Arcade Collection
essence: Help the frog cross busy roads and treacherous rivers to reach safety.
reactions: Navigate through traffic and floating logs.

title: Flappy Dot
author: Ploynky
essence: Navigate a dot through pipes by tapping to fly. Inspired by the viral Flappy Bird game.
